title: Ticket #254: Checkpoint compatability between 2.4 and 2.6 kernels
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

It's pretty slick that Dan got this working! Unfortunately, the patch set that we have seems to only include part of what is needed for this feature (I remember Dan talking about some register manipulation tricks that he figured out, but I see it nowhere in the stack of patches). We'd need to ping Dan to move forward on this should we want to include it in mainline Condor.

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (6).
remarks:
2009-Mar-09 15:40:43 by tannenba:
I believe this patch also enables checkpoint compatibility between early and current versions of the 2.6 kernel.
